title: Blended MOOC Design for Attitude-Based Social Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational experience in social interaction and leadership, digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Aims to foster effective attitudes and leadership in corporate managers/leaders participating in elementary school-linked social contribution programs. Provides a blended learning environment combining online MOOCs and offline workshops

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can explain attitude formation strategies for enhancing social responsibility
90% of participants demonstrate improved empathetic communication skills through online discussions and feedback activities
By course completion, over 75% of learners develop attitude-based leadership models applicable to real work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
